subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees starter C. C. Sabathia was found to have a degenerative condition in the cartilage in his right knee and was set to have a cortisone shot with stem cells, but the injury’s long-term effects were not clear.
snippet: Yankees starter C. C. Sabathia was found to have a degenerative condition in the cartilage in his right knee and was set to have a cortisone shot with stem cells, but the injury’s long-term effects were not clear.
